title: Robert Langer, Chemical Engineer and Entrepreneur
teaser: Host Jessica Harris speaks with Robert Langer, a chemical engineer who has pioneered the fields of drug delivery and tissue engineering. Harris also speaks with clothing designer Peter Manning.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris speaks with Robert Langer, a chemical engineer who has pioneered the fields of drug delivery and tissue engineering. Harris also speaks with clothing designer Peter Manning.
